Perform seven-step handwashing technique.sentence: The healthcare worker removes any jewelry and rolls up sleeves to the elbows.
Perform seven-step handwashing technique.subject: The healthcare worker

Perform seven-step handwashing technique.sentence: The healthcare worker wet their hands with clean, running water.
Perform seven-step handwashing technique.subject: The healthcare worker

Perform seven-step handwashing technique.sentence: The healthcare worker applies soap to their hands and lathers for at least 20 seconds.
Perform seven-step handwashing technique.subject: The healthcare worker

Perform seven-step handwashing technique.sentence: The healthcare worker rinses their hands thoroughly under clean, running water.
Perform seven-step handwashing technique.subject: The healthcare worker

Perform seven-step handwashing technique.sentence: The healthcare worker dries their hands using a clean towel or air dryer.
Perform seven-step handwashing technique.subject: The healthcare worker
